name: portfolio
description: - [ ] Demonstrate the skills I have learnt at Founders & Coders   - [ ] Use CSS flexbox and/or CSS grid to achieve a design that works on all screens.   - [ ] Install dependencies   - [ ] Build a server and a router   - [ ] Deploy on Heroku   - [ ] Use continuous integration (Travis)   - [ ] Testing       - [ ] Test on the front end       - [ ] Test on the back end       - [ ] Use Test Driven Development to build tests before I write code - [ ] Have a fantastic design - clear, minimalisti, yet fun and engaging. - [ ] Provide information about me! A portfolio of my skills, achievements and projects. - [ ] Make the website accessible as I go - it should be engrained in my design and building, not an afterthought.
